paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant A97S, including penetrance data and patient demographics.

functional_data.summary: Patients showed improvement in NT-proBNP levels after treatment with tafamidis.

variants.additional_notes: The study focused on the efficacy of tafamidis in patients with the A97S variant.
key_quotes: The patients with hereditary A97S ATTR-CM in this study had decreased levels of NT-proBNP after 6 months of tafamidis treatment.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the TTR gene was reported in the paper.
